code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useRefresh}from'../context/RefreshContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventList=()=>{const[events,setEventList]=useState([]);const{refreshEventList,setRefreshEventList}=useRefresh();console.log("Eventlist",events);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/getevents').then(response=>{setEventList(response.data);console.log(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching event list:',error);});},[refreshEventList,setRefreshEventList]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eventlistmain",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Explore Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"eventlist",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"eventitem card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Category: ",event.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Location: ",event.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",event.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time: ",event.startTime," - ",event.endTime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"desc",children:["Description: ",event.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attendees: ",event.attendees]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Joined: ",event.joined]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Organizer: ",event.organizer]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Join"})]},event._id))})]});};export default EventList;
